info.name: APS Postman Collection
info.description:
Autodesk Platform Services API Postman Collection

Please select the environment and add APS_CLIENT_ID and APS_CLIENT_SECRET.

If you're using BIM360 or ACC, add hub id. You can add project id as well for ease of testing

query.description: Key to use as an offset to continue pagination This is typically the last bucket key found in a preceding GET buckets response

request.description: Retrieves metadata of a given object.
Retrieves metadata of a given object.
Retrieves properties of a specific GUID in design data.
Get list of all available engines.
Get list of all available engines.
Get list of all available engines.

item.name: Web Hooks
Add a new Webhook secret token
Update an existing Webhook secret token

item.description: Please use Documentation for supported events: [https://aps.autodesk.com/en/docs/webhooks/v1/reference/events/]()
